titleStmt.title: To the constables and overseers of [blank] By vertue of a warrant to me directed from the standing committee at Chelmsford ...
titleStmt.author: Essex (England)

notesStmt.note: Title includes opening words of text.
Place and date of printing from Wing.
A directive required by the authority of Parliament to prepare for local defence against a possible invasion from Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
